name: token design 101
description:
In this workshop you will learn about: 
- What are token ecosystems & why should we care 
- 3 tools for token conceptualisation 
- The concept of token value 
- How utility & value capture mechanisms impact token value 
- Token utility & value capture mechanisms

Workshops will not be streamed or recorded. It will be held in English and no translation to Portuguese will be provided.
